CustomField.description: Black Light Inspection with Full Report and Photos $50. Fill in all fields in "Black Light Inspection Report" and attach photos Black Light Inspection with Brief Report $30. Include locations, quantity, severity of smell. Red/Bright Color Removal. $30 4 iron prints, $50 8 iron prints, $75 12 iron prints High Soil/Spot levels When it takes 50%+ greater than normal times for a given area, charge at the rate of $80/hr for the extra time. OCA Broad Based. $20-50 depending on size. OCA Targeted 10/1. $20/discharged canister. 10/1 OCA saturation applied to targeted areas that fluoresced Commercial This is used for commercial IC (interval cleans) or other commercial jobs. Other Use for areas not listed in Work Detail Information. Examples: Large basement room, extra large family room, extra hall, partial rooms. $20/canister discharged. Minimum Service Charge $85 Up to 30 minutes of work performed. Trip Charge $55 is added when when you could not start/complete job
